DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of G238 for the treatment of otomycosis
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of G238 Compared to Clotrimazole Otic Solution in the Treatment of Otomycosis
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older. Clinical diagnosis of otomycosis where topical treatment is indicated. Other ear diseases.
